actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove the dollar limitation on the exclusion for certain disability payments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an unlimited exclusion for amounts received under wage continuation plans for the disabled (presently, only $100 a week may be excluded).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove the dollar limitation on the exclusion for certain disability payments.
